ygData.subject: Language Impaired
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings. I have had two major self only quests I have been working on since this game started in release.  They are quite silly ones, but ones that mean a
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings.

I have had two major self only quests I have been working on since this game
started in release. They are quite silly ones, but ones that mean a lot to
me and ones that I have invested a lot of time and effort into. These are
1. Being able to walk freely in my un-illusioned DE Agnostic form in every
city. and 2. Mastering every language in the game to excellent.

The first one I am 90% complete. I can freely walk through felwithe (much
to the amazement of the high elf pcs), kelethin, kaladim, etc. etc. I am
still working on Halas and Ak'anon. This has been done 100% -without- using
the guild note trick, purely from quests and killing the right combination
of mobs. Something I take great pride in actually.

The second one I have run into a brick wall. The research languages are
easy to purchase in any zone, as so many people needed them, that everyone
and their brother now knows combine, old erudin, etc. etc. Heck, the tank
in my group two nights ago offered to teach me Combine for 5pp during our
downtime. The problem is the fringe languages. I was young and stupid, and
as soon as a language became available at the trainer, I would put a point
into it. Not knowing what I know now that that first point roughly equals
your level in skill points.

To make a very long and rambling first post short (he he, sorry), I am
looking for Gnoll, Goblin, Kobold, Fairie, Lizardman, Froglock, and Orc to
be trained to excellent on the Karana server. If there is any kind hearted
enchanter there that would sell me these languages, and/or take the time to
train me in them, I would be most grateful. If anyone can help, please send
me an email or an ingame tell.

Thanks in advance!

Athos
40th Enchanter Karana server
